servinfo.title: MIL Remains ON after Engine Starts

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to MIL Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch in ON Position and Engine Stopped (but Engine can be Started):J24B .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to MIL Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch in ON Position and Engine Stopped (but Engine can be Started):J24B .

attention3.ptxt: When measuring circuit voltage and/or pulse signal at ECM connector, connect special tool to ECM and ECM connectors.

test1.ptxt: Start engine and recheck DTC of ECM and TCM while engine running.

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good combination meter and recheck. If MIL still remains ON, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
